name: transfer_call
description: Transfer the active call to a human agent. Use this when the caller explicitly requests to speak with a human, when their issue requires human intervention, or when you cannot adequately help them. This will immediately transfer the call to the configured transfer number for this business.

reason.description: Brief reason for the transfer (optional, for logging purposes)

when_to_use: Caller explicitly asks to speak with a human
Issue is too complex for AI to handle
Sales opportunity that requires human touch
when_not_to_use: Simple questions that AI can answer
best_practices: Always acknowledge the transfer request: 'Let me transfer you to a team member right now'
Set expectations: 'Please hold while I connect you'
Provide context to the caller about what will happen

configuration.description: Each client must have a 'transfer_phone_number' field in their Supabase configuration

error_handling.no_transfer_number: Tool will return an error and AI should apologize and offer to take a message
error_handling.transfer_fails: Caller hears 'I'm sorry, but the transfer could not be completed' and call ends
error_handling.network_issues: Falls back to AI conversation if transfer cannot be initiated
